data.message: Hello, Unfortuantely I was hacked and my name was changed on facebook. it will not let me change my name back for 60 days and it is really driving me crazy. can I get some help with this?

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that, Jennifer. If someone else has logged into your account without your permission, please secure it here: on.fb.me/XqYbih. We can also help you make sure recent changes to your account were made by you and help you change your password: http://bit.ly/2zcixDK. -Kiara
They dont resond ive sebt 4 messages and a complaint and NOTHING IM FURIOUS
Yal got a super bug going through messenger...might wanna do an announcement. In 3 days Ive gotten 3 invites from 3 different people to open a video. Its spreading fast.
They messaged me and got it corrected in five minutes. Thank you face book!
Can u respond to me facebook
Jennifer Nicole Landers they haven't responded to me
I think they do if you create your own post
Jennifer Nicole Landers did they respond to u inside the message

Why the "fb.me" domain? Why not the same "facebook.com" domain that the main app is on?

Why "bit.ly", to change your PASSWORD, and not an "httpS" [i.e., (supposedly-)SECURE Internet connection to that Web-site?

Is THIS thread a hoax? Is Facebook being impersonated, in their own HOUSE?

Or are you just trying to figure out who is CAPABLE of being "on-guard", even if you have to jump up and down, and wear an "I'm An Enemy" T-shirt, in order to get us to think,  "Hmmm. Is it ME, or is that T-shirt more chartreuse, than spring-green?"
